item.title: Transport v2.0.0.25
item.description:
Product: Transport v2.0.0.25
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Wed, 20 Aug 2025 14:01:41 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment]
- Control Experiment.vi
- provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device
- record how the lockin is connected to the device
- configure the Krohn Hite amplifier
- set the base path for saving data
- configure peripheral instruments
- APIs for recording sample data, instrument status

[Transport]
Basic transport measurments:
- Lockin vs time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi)

[Transport Server]
Server used for scripting and performing asynchronous transport measurments.


Release Notes: [2.0.0]
#136 This version consolidates Control Experiment, Transport, and Transport Server packages
#133 improve startup to verify Lockin and KH status
#134 Transport Server show/hide from Conigure Experiment.vi window
#135 Configure Experiment atomatically starts and is in control of Transport Server
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Instrument Framework v1.15.8.44
item.description:
Product: Instrument Framework v1.15.8.44
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Tue, 19 Aug 2025 16:49:19 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: An object-oriented framework based on JKI SMOs, developed by the LevyLab at the University of Pittsburgh.

An Instrument developed using this framework will have the access to the following capabilities:

- Framework for communicating with hardware (Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL))
- Periodically polls the instrument for its settings and logs them to a PGSQL database
- Defines an API to allow external programs to control compiled instances of the application and remotely across a network (Either NI's Simple Messaging Library (STM) (deprecated in v1.9) or cross-platform protocol ZMQ (preferred beginning with v1.9))
- Provide a user interface (optional but probably desirable).
- Methods for reading and writing configuration from disk.

Release Notes: [1.15.8]
#182 rename HAL.lvclass:process.vi to HAL.lvclass:Process.vi; reported SMO Issue #90
Update dependencies
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: RemoteControl.ZMQ v1.3.1.22
item.description:
Product: RemoteControl.ZMQ v1.3.1.22
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Tue, 19 Aug 2025 10:17:49 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Override library implementing ZMQ lazy pirate reliable request reply (RRR) protocal using RemoteControl SMO framework.

Release Notes: [1.3.1]
#183: adjust timeout and retries for ZMQ_REQ socket to allow quicker confirmation that a connection is established

item.title: JSON-Schema v0.2.0.9
item.description:
Product: JSON-Schema v0.2.0.9
Company: PRIrvin
Release Date: Tue, 12 Aug 2025 23:35:03 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Library for converting LV objects into JSON Schema

Release Notes: #2 fix Creat JSON Schema (Interactive).vi button logic
#3 fix schema formatting of cluster and nested clusters
#4 fix converting table data to json datatypes (converts to numeric rather than string)
- add tools for building and stripping JSON $Path
- recursively inspect schema to table and vice versa (useful for nested clusters)
item.dc:creator: PRIrvin
